caption: This song features a guitar being played to a flamenco melody. Fingerstyle guitar is used. The song starts off at a higher register and ends at the lower register. The guitar is strummed at intervals. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this instrumental song. This song has a romantic mood. This song can be played at a quiet restaurant overlooking the sunset.
